pageProduct.name: Polident Denture Cleanser Fresh Active Tablets 36
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

Why clean your denture with Polident Cleanser instead of toothpaste?

While dentures are replacements for natural teeth, they are also about 10x softer. This means they can be vulnerable to scratches caused by abrasives found in regular toothpaste - leaving gaps for bacteria to grow in. Pretty soon, you could be dealing with bad breath caused by unhygienic dentures or other cleaning methods.

Polident 3 Minute Daily Cleanser kills 99.9% of odour-causing bacteria in just 3 minutes, and other micro-organisms in 5 minutes*.

Brought to you by Polident, the #1 Brand in Denture Care.*

Eat, speak and smile with confidence!
